rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0001
rows.name:
You call it a remote land,
but it's a nice place, isn't it?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0002
rows.name:
It's got so much nature.
I really like this place.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0003
rows.name: I'm glad you think so.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0004
rows.name:
I like this place too.
Someday, I'd like to settle down here
and focus on my architecture hobby.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0005
rows.name:
Then you'd better beat Metsu quickly
and start your retirement.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0006
rows.name: Yes, exactly.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0007
rows.name:
Will you all be staying
in this land for a while?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0008
rows.name:
Yeah. We want to gather intel on Metsu,
and the resistance has a few problems
that need sorting out.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0009
rows.name:
Then that's perfect.
I think I'll be heading out for a bit.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0010
rows.name:
Ah, regarding that matter.
Thank you for coming all this way,
Your Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0011
rows.name:
Your Majesty,
are you headed somewhere?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0012
rows.name:
We have units in a nearby archipelago
tasked with disarming the
remnants of the Shiyan army.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0013
rows.name:
I received a request to go
and boost their morale.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0014
rows.name:
I bet the soldiers' morale
would shoot up if you went.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0015
rows.name:
I'd like to show my appreciation
for their hard work, as well.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm taking Wadatsumi with me
as a bodyguard, but I'll leave
Kagutsuchi here as a point of contact.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0017
rows.name:
Even if you find Metsu,
don't go after him without us.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0018
rows.name:
I wouldn't be reckless enough to
take him on without you and Wadatsumi.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0019
rows.name:
That's a relief to hear.
Well then, I'll be on my way.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0020
rows.name: I'm counting on you, Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0021
rows.name: You too. Look after His Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0022
rows.name:
Alright, now we need to sort out
the resistance's problems.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0023
rows.name:
Can we help with that?
We'd be happy to.
Shin will help too, won't he?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0024
rows.name: Of course. If that's what you want.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0025
rows.name:
That'd be a big help.
I'm counting on you two.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0026
rows.name:
The problem is...
a shortage of provisions.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0027
rows.name: Provisions? Like, food?!

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0028
rows.name:
That's right. In a remote land like
this, we don't have the surplus to
feed the soldiers of the resistance.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0029
rows.name:
We can't let the whole army starve
to death before we even find Metsu.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0030
rows.name: True that.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0031
rows.name:
Military history is full of armies that
collapsed from starvation rather
than losing a battle.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0032
rows.name:
Exactly! Let's start by talking to Ivan,
the quartermaster.
